ca.mcgill.ecse211.localizers

Class LightLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.localizers.LightLocalizer

  • public class LightLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs the light localization at start of game.

               throws OdometerExceptions

        left - Left light sensor sample provider
        right - Right light sensor sample provider
        odometer - Odometer updating the position of the robot
        lMotor - Left motor instance
        rMotor - Right motor instance

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public void localize()
              throws OdometerExceptions
        This method assumes the ultrasonic localization has finished and robot is in the middle of the starting tile. It first moves forward and stops robot with light sensors ontop of perpendicular line ahead. Moves by offset of center to light sensors, turns right and does the same for the next perpendicular line. Once done corrects the odometer readings.
        Parameters:
        startingCorner - : starting corner of robot, main must pass this in
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions

      • findRightLine

        public static void findRightLine()
        This method finds the second right line for correcting the odometer

      • findLineAhead

        public static void findLineAhead()
                          throws OdometerExceptions
        This method find the first line ahead when starting the localization.
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
